author: Special Correspondent
text:
Ashok Vajpeyi says the university has acted against human dignity.

Writer and poet Ashok Vajpeyi on Tuesday returned the D.Litt. degree awarded to him by the University of Hyderabad. He said the “anti-Dalit” attitude of the university authorities had driven Rohith to commit suicide.

“How can I continue to be on the honours list of the Hyderabad Central University [in this situation],” Mr. Vajpeyi told a television news channel.

Ever since some students, including Rohith, were thrown out of the university hostel, they were living in a tent.

This was not a proper way to treat research scholars of a university, he said. He said the university, in the latest instance, had acted “against human dignity and knowledge”.
title: Vajpeyi returns D.Litt.
